name: Earth Inc.
summary:
Take control of a small mining company, and turn it into a multi galactic mega conglomerate. Idle and get rich even while sleeping, and become the billionaire tycoon you were always meant to be. Hire millions of workers and build your business tower to the sky. Make money across all continents. The world is your playground.
Environmental damage! Don’t mix ecologics with your economics, and keep stacking up that cash no matter the cost.
